title01-dt.comment: Use for desktop layout titles like H1s

title01-mw.comment: This is the responsive mobile web version of H1s

title01b.comment: Use for layout titles like LONG H1s.

title02.comment: Use for layout titles like cluster or section break titles

title03.comment: Use for component and layout titles like shelf and section titles

title04.comment: Use for component and layout titles like card titles

title05.comment: Use for component and layout titles like subsection titles

body01.comment: Use in both productive and brand type theme layouts for body copy. It is a good size for comfortable reading in paragraphs and lists. The color should be secondaryText (dark gray)

supporting01.comment: Supporting text 14/regular. Use in both productive and brand type theme layouts for supporting copy. Supporting copy has less importance and emphasis than body copy. Typically the color is secondaryText (dark gray)

supporting02.comment: Supporting text 12/regular. Use in both productive and brand type theme layouts for supporting copy. Supporting copy has less importance and emphasis than body copy. Typically the color is secondaryText (dark gray)

supporting03.comment: Supporting text 14/medium. Use in both productive and brand type theme layouts for supporting copy. Supporting copy has less importance and emphasis than body copy. Typically the color is secondaryText (dark gray)

supporting04.comment: Supporting text 12/medium. Use in both productive and brand type theme layouts for supporting copy. Supporting copy has less importance and emphasis than body copy. Typically the color is secondaryText (dark gray)
